Muy buen juego, muy buen modo cooperativo, buenos gráficos (físicas por sobre todo), una banda sonora muy auténtica que representa mucho a la franquicia Portal, modo historia bastante entretenido aunque algo trillado y corto. Un puntazo a favor a diferencia de la anterior entrega son las cámaras de la comunidad, ya que si te aburres del modo historia puedes jugar una gigante variedad de mapas comunitarios. 
Nota final: 9/10

It has been almost four years since I started off this game. Somehow I just stopped playing it halfway. I reckon I was stuck on a chapter and felt so exhausted to figure the puzzle out. I picked it i up again after 3 years. This time I just finished it straight away. 

I don't think this game can give you much instant pleasure which a bunch of FPS or MOBA games can bring with. For me personally, I feel I was tortured by this game when I couldn't constantly  find a way through. However, I was truly attracted by the plot and puzzle design of this game. This game reminds me of the discussions in a gaming forum about how you define a good game. Most of the time I am a simple person, who enjoy the easiest and quickest pleasure of games. I prefer to play games like PUBG, csgo and COD. These games are popular because they are easy to start and play. Dating back to the beginning of invention of computer games, the purpose of games is simple- they are designed to entertain people. Therefore, early games were so easy that they didn't give you many control options. Now games are evolving so enormously no matter  in the way of genres or graphics. We also have a few controversial games like death stranding emerging all the time. 

Back to this game- Portal 2. In terms of pleasure, I don't think this game can compare to super mario or other arcade games on early gaming consoles. However, this game can generate more sensations  than super mario. When I was playing this game, I found myself totally immersed in it- using some strange tools to solve some unknown puzzles. Once the puzzle was figured out, that satisfaction was like human-being mastered tools- a whole new era. The story of this game is dark but meantime many funny dialogues can be found, which light you up bit when you go through the depressing environment.

 Same as the development of movies and literature, which were created just for fun at beginning, games have now become a complex medium, where developers are able to convey much more thoughts than before. Overall I would recommend this game. This game gives me something more than pleasure.
